data.title: Planned Engineering Works
data.meta_description: Check the latest changes to train times and weekend travel information that may affect your journey. Click here for more on planned engineering work.
data.text:
Engineering work is taking place between Huddersfield and Leeds, closing some lines. As a result, the following services will not call at Huddersfield but will additionally call at Brighouse:

01:34 York to Manchester Airport

02:44 Manchester Piccadilly to York

02:48 York to Manchester Airport

A rail replacement bus service will be in operation between Brighouse and Huddersfield.

Check before you travel:

You can plan your journey using the National Rail Enquiries Journey Planner

Replacement Bus Travel Advice:

For helpful advice if you need to travel on a rail replacement service, including accessibility and bicycle information, please use this page.

You can find the location of your bus replacement by checking station signs or by searching for your station on our station information pages.

Please be advised that replacement vehicles may be busier than usual, and you should allow extra time for your journey.

Engineering work is taking place between Stalybridge and Manchester Piccadilly, closing some lines.

Monday - Thursday

The 22:54 Liverpool Lime Street to Huddersfield service will terminate at Stalybridge. A replacement bus will be provided from Stalybridge to Huddersfield.

The 22:45 Scarborough to Manchester Piccadilly service will terminate at Manchester Victoria.

The 22:41 Leeds to Manchester Piccadilly service will be diverted to Manchester Victoria and will not call at Slaithwaite, Marsden, Greenfield, Mossley, Stalybridge or Manchester Piccadilly. A replacement bus will provided from Huddersfield calling at Slaithwaite, Marsden, Greenfield, Mossley, Stalybridge and Manchester Piccadilly.

Tuesday - Friday

The 02:44 Manchester Piccadilly to York service will start from Manchester Victoria at 02:50.

The 06:14 Liverpool Lime Street to Cleethorpes service will start from Manchester Piccadilly at 07:11.

Check before you travel:

You can plan your journey using the National Rail Enquiries Journey Planner

Replacement Bus Travel Advice:

For helpful advice if you need to travel on a rail replacement service, including accessibility and bicycle information, please use this page.

You can find the location of your bus replacement by checking station signs or by searching for your station on our station information pages.

Please be advised that replacement vehicles may be busier than usual, and you should allow extra time for your journey.

Replacement Bus Travel Advice:

For helpful advice if you need to travel on a rail replacement service, including accessibility and bicycle information, please use this page.

You can find the location of your bus replacement by checking station signs or by searching for your station on our station information pages.

Please be advised that replacement vehicles may be busier than usual, and you should allow extra time for your journey.

Engineering work is taking place between Marsden and Mirfield, and also between Lockwood and Huddersfield, closing all lines.

Northern:

Saturday only:

Trains between Bradford Interchange and Huddersfield will not run.

Buses will be operate between Huddersfield and Brighouse / Halifax. These are supplied by TransPennine Express.

Sunday only:

Trains between Leeds and Huddersfield will start / terminate at Halifax

Buses will be operate between Huddersfield and Brighouse / Halifax. These are supplied by TransPennine Express.

Saturday and Sunday:

Trains will start / terminate at Lockwood.

Rail replacement buses will run between Lockwood and Huddersfield.

TransPennine Express:

No trains will run to / from Huddersfield.

An hourly train service will run between Manchester and Marsden.

Services to / from Hull will run between Hull and Leeds only.

Services between Saltburn and Manchester will start / terminate at Manchester Victoria instead of Manchester Airport. They will not be calling at Huddersfield but will be calling additionally at Brighouse.

Services between Newcastle and Liverpool Lime Street will not be calling at Stalybridge and Huddersfield but will be calling additionally at Brighouse.

Services to / from Scarborough will run between Scarborough and York / Leeds only.

Two trains per hour will run via Brighouse.

The following rail replacement transport will operate:

Saturday:

Between Huddersfield and Mirfield (via Deighton)

Between Huddersfield and Brighouse (extending to / from Halifax hourly)

Between Huddersfield and Manchester Airport (via Stockport)

Between Huddersfield and Manchester Piccadilly (direct)

Between Huddersfield and Marsden, calling at Slaithwaite

Sunday:

Between Huddersfield and Leeds via Dewsbury

Between Huddersfield and Brighouse (extending to / from Halifax hourly)

Between Huddersfield and Manchester Airport (via Stockport)

Between Huddersfield and Manchester Piccadilly (direct)

Between Huddersfield and Marsden, calling at Slaithwaite

Check before you travel:

You can plan your journey using the National Rail Enquiries Journey Planner
